participant_1.background:
I'm a free spirit who enjoys the simple things in life, like wearing flip flops.
I love my pets very much and enjoy spending time with them.
Baseball helps me to relax and temporarily forget about my anxiety.
i just got my rejection letter from the gifted program.
I have a secret tattoo that my dad would hate.

participant_2.background:
I haven't told my parents that I'm secretly training my collie to race.
i am a huge fan of dogs.
I'm still trying to figure out if my car is sentient or not.
i can tell right away if i m going to like someone.
I enjoy my quiet life and green tea.

content.text: What's your favorite thing to do on a lazy day?
I love to curl up with a good book and a cup of green tea.
Me too! I love to read mystery novels. What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read everything from mysteries to historical fiction. I just finished reading a book about a collie racing team.
Oh, that sounds interesting! I love dogs. I have a collie of my own.
No way! I have a collie too! What's your dog's name?
His name is Bailey. What's your dog's name?
Those are both great names! I'm sure they're both wonderful dogs.
They are! They're both very sweet and loving.
I'm glad to hear that. I love dogs. They're the best.
